headline: Is Intuit (INTU) Turning Physical TurboTax Stores Into a New Competitive Moat?
summary: Earlier this month, Intuit Inc. opened its Intuit TurboTax flagship store in New York City’s SoHo neighborhood and completed a nationwide rollout of nearly 600 Expert Office locations and 20 TurboTax stores, while also securing a new US$2.20 billion revolving credit facility and forming a technology partnership with BDO Canada LLP. By pairing agentic AI with human expertise in physical TurboTax locations and embedding QuickBooks into BDO Canada’s advisory offering, Intuit is pushing its...
